title: The Addiction Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Changed name in early 2013; originally named Chili Addiction. Quick service restaurant specializing in chili. Has a separate vegan menu (you have to ask for it) that includes vegan chili, vegan hot dog, vegan chili cheese fries, vegan sausage, vegan nachos, and vegan burger. The hot sauce and ketchup are made from scratch. Casual place, order at the counter and the food is brought to your table. It's next door to Real Food Daily vegan restaurant. Street parking.
